refnamediv.refpurpose: Detect human body parts like face ,nose,eye and ear.

listitem.para: image matrix on which Cascadeobject detection has to be performed
An input string which specify the name of the object which has to be detect
an output image in which object are bounded by rectangle.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function uses the Viola-Jones algorithm to detect the object from given input image.The function first finds the target object on the image then makes a rectangle on detected part of the image.To detect the object it uses already trained data which are stored in .xml file.User can use own trained data for better object detection.
